sentences.en: Compulsion will never result in convincing them.
sentences.cn: 强迫永远不会使他们信服.
证明他有罪的有力证据

sentences.en: Group discussion is also immensely helpful in convincing patients that they can choose a course that feels right to them.
sentences.cn: 小组讨论在让病人相信可以选择适合自己的疗程方面也能发挥巨大的作用。

sentences.en: He further rationalized his activity by convincing himself that he was actually promoting peace.
sentences.cn: 他坚信自己实际上是在促进和平，以此进一步将自己的行为合理化。

sentences.en: He's only convincing when that inner fury manifests itself.
sentences.cn: 只有在那内心的愤怒充分表露的时候，他才令人信服。

sentences.en: His sales pitch was smooth and convincing.
sentences.cn: 他的推销词流畅又有说服力。

sentences.en: His version of the accident seemed most convincing.
sentences.cn: 他对该事件的叙述似乎最令人信服.

sentences.en: I took a lot of convincing that parenthood was a good idea and I didn't think I'd be much use at it.
sentences.cn: 很多人都劝我要个孩子好，但我觉得为人父母我真的不适合。

sentences.en: Our greatest problem is convincing them.
sentences.cn: 我们最大的问题就是要说服他们。

sentences.en: She knew that her efforts to feign cheerfulness weren't convincing.
sentences.cn: 她明白自己强作欢颜是瞒不了谁的.

sentences.en: She said goodbye to Hilda with a convincing show of affection.
sentences.cn: 她和希尔达道别时流露出了明显的爱意。

sentences.en: The data we have collected is not enough to be convincing.
sentences.cn: 我们所收集的资料还不足以令人信服.

sentences.en: The data you have collected is not enough to be convincing.
sentences.cn: 你们收集的材料说服力不足.

sentences.en: There is convincing evidence of a link between exposure to sun and skin cancer.
sentences.cn: 有可靠证据表明日光曝晒与皮肤癌之间有联系。

sentences.en: This argument seems convincing, but is easily overturned.
sentences.cn: 这个论点好像令人信服, 但很容易就被推翻了.

sentences.en: We need a convincing win to put us back on the right track.
sentences.cn: 我们需要一场令人信服的大胜，以重回正轨。
